create_project.project_code: Project Code must have less than 32 characters and contain only lowercase letters and numbers.
create_project.project_name: Project Name must no more than 100 characters.
create_project.project_description: Project Description must be no more than 250 characters.
create_project.tags: Tags must have less than 32 characters and cannot contain spaces.
create_project.role_admin: Project Administrators are able to add users to their Project as well as to upload, view, and download any data in their Project's Green Room.
create_project.role_contributor: Project Contributors are able to upload data to their Project's Green Room storage but can only view or download data files they have uploaded themselves.

upload.dcm_id: Please enter the {{ DcmSpaceID }}s in the format 'ABC-1234'.

password: Password must include 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number, 1 special character (-_!%&/()=?*+#,.;) and be 11-30 characters long.
